resources.string: In order for nearby sharing to work, we need access to your location to find nearby users and to your device\'s storage so we can read and write flashcard set files.
Other nearby users looking to share will show up below. Simply tap to connect and start sharing!
Your nearby name is how you appear to other Simple Flashcards Plus users when using the nearby sharing feature.
You need to set a nearby name so other Simple Flashcards Plus users know who you are when you try connecting with them.
We failed to broadcast your presence to nearby users. Please reload this page.
We failed to start scanning for nearby users. Please reload this page.
We failed to request a connection to that device. Please try again.
%s would like to connect with you
The other device rejected the connection request.
Make sure the token below matches the one shown on the other device.
We failed to establish a connection between the 2 devices. Please try again.
Waiting for the other user to accept the connection…
You have no flashcard sets to share.
You haven\'t received any flashcard sets yet from %s.
We failed to send your flashcard set: %s.
